column4: Is there a way to create a partition to match exactly the image I want to dd into it? In size that is.

What I want to do is restore an image I made of a partition using dd. I now need to make a new partition again to match the old size. How can I do this so I can dd the old image into the new partition?
use fdisk to create the partition, make it the same size of the previous one (or bigger). if bigger, run resize2fs afterwards.
